mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TICKET_HISTORY WHERE TICKET_CODE = #{ticketCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT TICKET_CODE as ticketCode ,BRANCH_ID as branchId ,ROOM_ID as roomId ,SCREEN_ID as screenId ,USER_ID as userId ,MOVIE_ID as movieId ,SEAT_NM as seatNm ,ADULT_CNT as adultCnt ,PAY_STATE as payState ,COST as cost ,TO_CHAR(PAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as payDt ,TO_CHAR(TICKET_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ticketDt FROM TICKET_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT T.RNUM as num ,T.TICKET_CODE as ticketCode ,T.BRANCH_ID as branchId ,T.ROOM_ID as roomId ,T.SCREEN_ID as screenId ,T.USER_ID as userId ,T.MOVIE_ID as movieId ,T.SEAT_NM as seatNm ,T.ADULT_CNT as adultCnt ,T.PAY_STATE as payState ,T.COST as cost ,TO_CHAR(T.PAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as payDt ,TO_CHAR(T.TICKET_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ticketDt FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM TICKET_HISTORY
ORDER BY TICKET_DT )A WHERE CEIL(ROWNUM/ #{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) = #{pageNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )T

SELECT TICKET_CODE as ticketCode ,BRANCH_ID as branchId ,ROOM_ID as roomId ,SCREEN_ID as screenId ,USER_ID as userId ,MOVIE_ID as movieId ,SEAT_NM as seatNm ,ADULT_CNT as adultCnt ,PAY_STATE as payState ,COST as cost ,TO_CHAR(PAY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as payDt ,TO_CHAR(TICKET_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ticketDt FROM TICKET_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SCREEN_ID = #{screenId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SEAT_NM = #{seatNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT BRANCH_ID as branchId, ROOM_ID as roomId, SEAT_NM as seatNm, SEAT_Y as seatY, SEAT_X as seatX, USE_YN as useYN, SCREEN_ID as screenId FROM SEAT_RESERVATION WHERE ROOM_ID = #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SCREEN_ID = ( SELECT SCREEN_ID FROM SCREEN_INFO WHERE ROOM_ID = #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SCREEN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SYSDATE >= START_TIME AND SYSDATE < END_TIME )
